doc.field: Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records
Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records
Series II. Personnel: Vice President and Director: Robert M. Steed Files
Series II. Personnel: Vice President and Director: Robert M. Steed Files

The groups of files in this series were found housed together and the primary correspondent is Robert "Bob" M. Steed, Vice President, Personnel Director. The largest run of alphabetically grouped files are designated as general office files while smaller groupings address specific topics or areas of the company. His files document changes in Time Inc. benefits, compensation, employment policies and guidelines; directories and staff lists; and personnel statistics.
